message: I am using taglist, but ctags doesn't work with CSS files. It's not one of the supported languages, and just won't give you any tags for it

I know lots of people use ctags with vim, but has anyone gotten ctags to work with CSS files? I can't seem to find a good resource to do it that doesn't require me to recompile ctags, and I really don't want to go there on windows
Hmm, it works for me. Are you using the taglist plugin with it? http://www.vim.org/scripts/script.php?script_id=273 BTW, Say hi to Amir Eshel for me? When is our next poker match? :P
Hmm, you're right. My bad. I was thinking about auto-complete.
